entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 12:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: NE 52 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Agassiz. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Agassiz. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Agassiz in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
